mapper.select: select ENTITY_CODE from TM_ENTITY_DEALER_CHANGE where DEALER_CODE = #{dearlerCode}
select DEALER_CODE,EMPLOYEE_NO,EMPLOYEE_NAME,ORG_CODE, IS_VALID FROM TM_EMPLOYEE WHERE IS_VALID=12781001 AND DEALER_CODE=#{dealerCode} AND EMPLOYEE_NO=#{employeeNo}

SELECT tipe.PRODUCT_ID, tipe.PRODUCT_NO, tipe.PRODUCT_NAME, ( CASE WHEN tipe.IS_VALID = 12781001 THEN '是' ELSE '否' END ) IS_VALID, ( CASE WHEN tipe.IS_C_SALE = 12781001 THEN '是' ELSE '否' END ) IS_C_SALE, ( CASE WHEN tipe.PRODUCT_DATE = 12 THEN '12个月' WHEN tipe.PRODUCT_DATE = 24 THEN '24个月' WHEN tipe.PRODUCT_DATE = 36 THEN '36个月' ELSE '' END ) PRODUCT_DATE, tipe.PRODUCT_MODEL, tipe.SALES_DATE_START, tipe.SALES_DATE_END, ( CASE WHEN 1 = 1 THEN concat( DATE_FORMAT( tipe.SALES_DATE_START, '%Y-%m-%d' ), '--', DATE_FORMAT(tipe.SALES_DATE_END, '%Y-%m-%d') ) ELSE '' END ) SALES_DATE_ALL, DATE_FORMAT(tipe.RELEASE_DATE, '%Y-%m-%d') RELEASE_DATE, ( CASE WHEN tipe.RELEASE_STATUS = 54011001 THEN '未发布' WHEN tipe.RELEASE_STATUS = 54011002 THEN '已发布' WHEN tipe.RELEASE_STATUS = 54011003 THEN '已取消' ELSE '' END ) RELEASE_STATUS, ( CASE WHEN tipe.PRODUCT_FAIT = 10041001 THEN '是' ELSE '否' END ) PRODUCT_FAIT, ( CASE WHEN tipe.PRODUCT_JEEP = 10041001 THEN '是' ELSE '否' END ) PRODUCT_JEEP, ( CASE WHEN tipe.PRODUCT_CJD = 10041001 THEN '是' ELSE '否' END ) PRODUCT_CJD, tipe.PRODUCT_DESCRIBTION, tipe.NON_TAX_COST_PRICE, tipe.TAX_COST_PRICE, tipe.TERMINAL_NON_SALES_PRICE, tipe.TERMINAL_SALES_PRICE FROM ti_opi_extended_dcs tipe LEFT JOIN tm_dealer tmd ON (tipe.PRODUCT_JEEP = tmd.IS_K4 OR tipe.PRODUCT_FAIT =tmd.IS_FIAT OR tipe.PRODUCT_CJD =tmd.IS_CJD )
LIMIT #{startRow},#{rowSize}
select count(PRODUCT_ID) from ti_opi_extended_dcs tipe LEFT JOIN tm_dealer tmd ON (tipe.PRODUCT_JEEP = tmd.IS_K4 OR tipe.PRODUCT_FAIT =tmd.IS_FIAT OR tipe.PRODUCT_CJD =tmd.IS_CJD )
